head.title: About
head.summary: Tracker Business Intelligence Toolkit and Featured Solutions

webpage.para: Tracker is a Business Intelligence (BI) Toolkit and suite of BI Featured solutions for animal agriculture professionals. Tracker BI Features provide historical, current, and predictive views of animal agriculture business operations.

section.title: Livestock Business Intelligence Toolkit
section.para: The Tracker BI Toolkit is an Eclipse based network aware rich client platform that can be installed with one or more BI Features.

section.title: Tracker Business Intelligence Features
Tracker Business Intelligence Solutions
Network Aware Business Objects
section.para:
Tracker BI Features are network repository resident business objects that can be selected by the user for installation in the Tracker Toolkit. Once installed Tracker Business Intelligence Features are updated and managed from within the Tracker BI Toolkit to meet specific business needs of the user. Tracker BI Features support:
Open Data formats for improved data management,
Open Source Code to insure auditing transparency and future extensibility,
Component Based functionality to speed development and administration,
Industry Standardization to meet the needs of a multi-vendor integrated marketplace,
and Multi-platform runtimes to expand user and use-case operating system and hardware platform choices.
